constructor.details: Sets the LinkToken address, Registry address and payment in LINK tokens for one validation

params._linkToken: The address of the LINK token
params._paymentCappers: Addresses allowed to update payment amount per validation

onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes).details: Method invoked when LINK tokens transferred via transferAndCall method. Requires additional encoded data

params._data: Encoded additional data needed to initiate domain verification: `abi.encode(uint256 tokenId, string code)`

params._operatorPaymentPerValidation: Payment amount in LINK tokens when verification initiated via Operator
params._userPaymentPerValidation: Payment amount in LINK tokens when verification initiated directly by user via Smart Contract call

setValidation(string,string,uint256,uint.details: Sets twitter username and signature to .crypto domain records

params._requestId: Request id for validations were requested from Smart Contract. If validation was requested from operator `_requestId` should be equals to zero.
params._signature: Signed twitter username. Ensures the validity of twitter username

withdraw(address,uint256).details: The owner of the contract can be another wallet and does not have to be a Chainlink node

params._amount: The amount to send (specified in wei)
params._recipient: The address to send the LINK token to

availableBalance().notice: Method returns available LINK tokens balance minus held tokens

canSetValidation().notice: Method returns true if Node Operator able to set validation

methods.constructor: Deploy with the address of the LINK token, domains registry and payment amount in LINK for one valiation

setPaymentPerValidation(uint256,uint256).notice: Method allows to update payments per one validation in LINK tokens

setValidation(string,string,uint256,uint.notice: Method will be called by Chainlink node in the end of the job. Provides user twitter name and validation signature

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Allows the node operator to withdraw earned LINK to a given address
